title: Chomsky theory of language development | CDP | ENGLISH PEDAGOGY | CTET, TET, TEACHING EXAMS
description:
In this video Noam Chomsky's theory of language development is discussed in detail.

Important concepts
1. Innate ability of language acquisition
2. LAD
3. Universal grammar
4. Generative grammar
5. Level of language acquisition
